sentences:
The Sound Barrier ( known in the United States , as Breaking Through the Sound Barrier and Breaking the Sound Barrier ) is a 1952 British film directed by David Lean .
It is a fictional story about attempts by aircraft designers and test pilots to break the sound barrier .
It was David Lean 's third and final film with his wife Ann Todd , but it was his first for Alexander Korda 's London Films following the break - up of Cineguild .
The Sound Barrier stars Ralph Richardson , Ann Todd , and Nigel Patrick .
The Sound Barrier was a box - office success on first release , but it has become one of the least - known of Lean 's films .
Following on In Which We Serve ( 1942 ) , the film is another of Lean 's ventures into a genre of filmmaking where impressions of documentary film are created .
